item.title: EP 557 - A Movie Made To Catch A Killer!
item.itunes:title: A Movie Made To Catch A Killer!
item.description:
Today we fall into a hole of rats, meet the garbage incarnate, and then make a movie to catch the Zodiac!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

The Dragon

https://deadrabbitradio.libsyn.com/ep-201-the-dragon

And Now, a Sinkhole Full of Rats

https://www.thecut.com/2020/10/sinkhole-opens-in-nyc-sidewalk-plunging-man-into-rat-pit.html

Video Shows Moment Sidewalk Collapsed Below Man Waiting At Bronx Bus Stop

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CbXb5zRpYYk&feature=youtu.be&ab_channel=CBSNewYork

NJ woman survives harrowing ride through Passaic's drainage system during flood

https://www.northjersey.com/story/news/passaic/passaic-city/2020/07/07/nj-woman-survives-ride-through-passaics-drainage-system-during-flood/5394430002/

Man in Garbage Bag Suit Set Garbage Trucks On Fire, Causing Millions in Damage: BSO

https://www.nbcmiami.com/news/local/man-in-garbage-bag-suit-set-garbage-trucks-on-fire-causing-millions-in-damage-bso/2311060/

Florida man in garbage-bag ‘suit’ sets fire to trash trucks

https://nypost.com/2020/10/26/florida-man-in-garbage-bag-suit-trashes-waste-trucks/

A Pizzeria Owner's Bizarre Plot to Capture the Zodiac Killer

https://www.mentalfloss.com/article/509038/pizzeria-owners-bizarre-plot-capture-zodiac-killer

The Zodiac Killer Film

https://tubitv.com/movies/499949/the-zodiac-killer?utm_source=google-feed&tracking=google-feed

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Email: DeadRabbitRadio@gmail.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
